value.0:
This is your Pack Animal Control Staff. I know....a little small to be a staff but Oh Well.....imagine it is a staff that does not fill up your inventory.

To Use:
Target Yourself - 

1) This sets the Pack Animal to follow you. This is module wide so if you are in a different area.....no problem. 

2) If you have logged in and do not have the Pack Animal simply target yourself and the Animal will come to your side.

Targetting the Ground -

1) This Sets a location where the Pack Animal will go and stay until you call it or log off.


Logging Off:

When you Log off the Pack Animal will automatically despawn and wait for your return.


Pack Box:

When you get a Pack Animal you also get access to a Pack Box that is 100% persistent. Talk to the Pack Animal to do various things with the Box. When you put stuff in the Box it DOES ADD weight to the Pack Animal. And depending upon how strong the Pack Animal is determines how much weight it can carry.
